name: Half Slime
description:
You play as a little slime who can pick up balls of slime to get bigger and be able to throw them against the walls to create platforms. To create a projectile, he need to separate himself in half !

https://liluo.io/boumguys/half-slime

(Tutorial in game)
English is not my primary language so there are probably mistakes.
Unfortunately, i was only able to work  on the game this weekend so if it looks unfinished it's normal :(
All of the art, code music was made by me.
I use JFXR for the sounds and I use the Kenney Pixel Square font.
